name: Pokedex Z
description:
Pokedex Z is a Pokedex tool which contains all six generations.

This will be the only Pokedex (all gens free) you need!

Features:
• Egg Groups
• Shinies (Shiny Sprites)
• Base Stats
• Gender Ratio
• Evolution
• Description
• Search Feature
• Clean Interface
• Cries
• All Six Generations
• X/Y Locations
• Mega-Evolutions
• Move List
• Locations
